ygData.subject: Re: Weapon Damage [was: L50 (Spoilers)]
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm those are the right stats but i don t know the weight.  I think you need a group higher than level 13 to get one, maybe around 18 or so.  and they go for
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm those are the right stats but i don't know the weight. I think you need
a group higher than level 13 to get one, maybe around 18 or so. and they go
for 200 to 250pp, i paid 200pp for mine.

Shada Silverleaf, Level 50 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
Erisi, Level 7 Paladin, Mithaniel Marr


> -----Original Message-----
> From: James Schuldes [mailto:jgs@...]
> Sent: Thursday, July 08, 1999 6:26 AM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Weapon Damage [was: L50 (Spoilers)]
>
>
> From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
> Also, I hear that there is a shield - Darkwood Shield that has a str
> booster?
>
> Ok, Eqlizer says: AC 12 and str +9 - anyone know the weight?
> Says found in
> High Pass Hold - I heard 100pp or so. Are they very rare or
> will ppl sell
> em? Can a level 13 find a group in HPH?
>
> Sylly.
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
> [mailto:Michael.Garramone@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, July 07, 1999 4:56 PM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Weapon Damage [was: L50
> (Spoilers)]
>
> From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)"
> <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
> some items i have that enhance strength are:
>
> Golden Amber Earrings +3STR each (~100pp pair)
> Silver Ruby Veil +4STR +4WIS (~200pp)
> Jagged Bands 5AC +3STR each (~150pp each)
> Purity Belt +2STR +2STA (~15pp)
>
> i think some lower level items are the spiked
> collar +3STR,
> flesh bands
> +2STR each, and the purity belt.
>
> Shada Silverleaf, Level 50 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
> Erisi, Level 7 Paladin, Mithaniel Marr
